detectors.description: BlockQueens.getRandomNum(uint256) (BlockQueens.sol#237-240) uses a weak PRNG: random % upper (BlockQueens.sol#239)

BlockQueens.getRandomNum(uint256) (BlockQueens.sol#237-240) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: random = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty,msg.sender))) (BlockQueens.sol#238)
detectors.markdown: [BlockQueens.getRandomNum(uint256)](crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xa98cc213495b178bc0aa690223325bbed2dbbc71-BlockQueens/BlockQueens.sol#L237-L240) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: [random = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty,msg.sender)))](crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xa98cc213495b178bc0aa690223325bbed2dbbc71-BlockQueens/BlockQueens.sol#L238)
